text: Aey eman walo! Tum Allah ki khatir haq per qaeem hojao raasti aur insaf kay sath gawahi denay walay bann jao kissi qom ki adawat tumhen khilaf-e-adal per aamaada na ker dey adal kiya kero jo perhezgari kay ziyada qarib hai aur Allah Taalaa say dartay raho yaqeen mano kay Allah Taalaa tumharay aemaal say ba khabar hai
